text:
Aww yeah! Today we're back with another
fantastic lesson with the action-packed
movie Jurassic World

Jurassic World is part of the Jurassic
Park film series which started all the
way back in 1993.

It is centered around
the disastrous attempt at creating a
theme park with cloned dinosaurs.
In this lesson you will learn some great English

expressions and vocabulary so let's get
started and learn English with Jurassic World.

I'm Andrea, your RealLife English
fluency coach and in case you're new

here I want to let you know that every
week we make lessons just like this one

to help you learn English without
getting lost without missing the jokes
and without subtitles.
just like Alejandro who says that he is

understanding natives so much better by
watching through our channel so don't

forget to hit that subscribe button and
the bell down below so that you don't
miss a single lesson

Then our fluent with friends course would be

perfect for you
in this forty eight week course you will

learn with the first two seasons of
Friends and you get 20+ page PDF power lessons

vocabulary memorization
software access to our fluency circle
global community and so much more
